Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This exceptional item carries a unique value that transcends its monetary worth, offering unparalleled benefits and experiences to those who possess it. I am offering this remarkable product to you at an exclusive price of $2000000. I believe this investment would not only add significant value to your collection but also serve as a testament to your discerning taste and commitment to quality. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this opportunity further or if there's any way I can provide additional information to help you make an informed decision. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $2,000,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $2,000,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
